title: How do you check how old the account is?
body: **How do you check how old the account is?**

replies.body: That's not information that we have on hand to share.  It's actually a question we ask when we help players with an account recovery, so it's best kept secret.  Hope that helps clear things up!
wouldn't this be an issue since a person would have no clue of how old their account is considering they don't keep this info on hand?
